column2: how often have you felt mentally exhausted?
how often have you had difficulty sleeping?
how often have you felt anxious or tense?
how often have you struggled to concentrate?
how often have you felt little interest or pleasure in doing things?
how often have you felt hopeless?
how often have you felt physically drained?
how often have you felt irritable?
how often have you worried excessively?
how often have you felt overwhelmed by work?
